title: Annie's kit is toxic and requires a rework for her to be healthy
body:
I have come to understand that her current kit can not be made healthy if it continues to function as it currently exists, no matter how hard they hit the numbers she will just become trash due to having no damage.

Her passive and E must be reworked, the rest of her kit is fine imo.  Please Riot, fix this abomination so that everyone may have fun playing as and against Annie
